Title: Extends the prohibition on the eviction of residential tenants who have suffered financial hardship during the COVID-19 covered period
Summary: Extends the prohibition on the eviction of residential tenants who have suffered financial hardship during the COVID-19 covered period through April 15, 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 127 of the laws of 2020, relating to prohibiting the eviction of residential tenants who have suffered financial hardship during the COVID-19 covered period, in relation to extending the prohibition on the eviction of residential tenants who have suffered financial hardship during the COVID-19 covered period
